pages.title: Power Port
pages.text: The Power Port allow you to provide the energy needed to power the Reprocessor.$(br2)Any Forge Energy compatible cable or generator can be connected to the Power Port.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() one, and only one, is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any vertical face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
